content.raw:
I see 4 options of which non seems great:

1. a repo for ech pull request (thats what I did at the beginning and it was messy as hell)
1. Each regular contributer becomes part of the team and merges their own request upon reaching enough approval (Not sure you guys want to give that much 'power' away)
1. Before merge ask the author to close the branches (this is really annoying)
1. regular pruning of merged branches (probably the best solution
content.html:
I see 4 options of which non seems great:

  1. a repo for ech pull request (thats what I did at the beginning and it was messy as hell)
  2. Each regular contributer becomes part of the team and merges their own request upon reaching enough approval (Not sure you guys want to give that much 'power' away)
  3. Before merge ask the author to close the branches (this is really annoying)
  4. regular pruning of merged branches (probably the best solution
